alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Eagle and northeastern Pitkin Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 425 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Snowmass, or 30 miles east of Glenwood Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meridith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
